articles.title: Alex Clippinger
articles.contents:
Home
          
          
          Portfolio
          About Me
          CV/Resume
          Blog
          ☰
          
          
      
        
          
            Alex Clippinger
          
          
            
              I graduated with a Bachelor’s Degree in Mathematics and Economics from Northeastern University in 2019. I got a glimpse of the applications of data science and the environmental challenges working as a catastrophe risk modeler. I. While working, I earned a Graduate Certificate in Geographic Information Systems (GIS) in 2021 and began pursuing a career combining environmental science and data. This began with an internship as a geospatial analyst, which provided me with experience using geospatial technologies (GIS, remote sensing, and machine learning tools) for agriculture analytics. Currently, I am a Master of Environmental Data Science student at the Bren School of Environmental Science and Management at UC Santa Barbara. Through this program,
